About Us
Nestled along the scenic Cocoa Beach riverfront
The Riverfront Cocoa Beach offers breathtaking views of the Banana River. This picturesque location is the perfect backdrop for adventures and celebrations alike, making it a favored destination for both locals and visitors.
Unforgettable kayaking and paddle boarding experience
Enjoy our top-notch rentals and guided tours that let you explore the beautiful waters of Cocoa Beach like never before!
Experience our exquisite venue
Ideal for weddings, birthday parties, corporate events, and private gatherings. Nestled in a picturesque location, it’s the perfect backdrop for crafting unforgettable moments and lasting memories for you and your guests!
Join our community by becoming a member!
For just $50 per person with a minimum commitment of three months, you can enjoy exclusive access to events, special discounts on rentals, and much more. Come and experience everything The Riverfront has to offer!
Learn more
